getApproxNumResults

public java.lang.String getApproxNumResults()
The business rules are to show "More than 100 results" if > 100, else show the exact number. We treat the approx number returned by ecsf as an exact number, till we know better.

showOrder

public void showOrder(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent e)
Show the order by popup to allow the ordering of the results to be changed.

Parameters:
e - event.

unifiedNavigate

public void unifiedNavigate(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent e)
Perform a navigate to the search result, either in classic UIShell or FUSE. The TaskSearchAction will have been stored in pageFlowScope under the key "GlobalSearchNavTarget".

Parameters:
e - event.

put

protected void put(java.util.Map params,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.Object value)
Convenience method to put name=value pair into params, guarding against null values.

Parameters:
params - non - null Map.
name - non - null key.
value - possibly null value. null values will not be stored.
